name: Emberv3 AI Assistant Workspace
description: Advanced AI coding assistant with background agents, LLM integration, and automated project management capabilities.
goals: agent1: Monitor project files and automatically load context
agent2: Maintain AI personality and consistent behavior
agent3: Watch environment variables and configuration changes
agent4: Track dependencies and package updates
agent5: Preload and warm LLM for optimal performance
agent6: Provide startup notifications and status updates
